title: Higglety Pigglety Pop! or There Must Be More to Life
description: Amazon Editors recommend this book for readers who enjoy chapter books with more complexity or entry-level middle grade novels. A daring imagination has woven a simple rhyme into a brilliantly original tale about Jennie, the Sealyham terrier, who seeks Experience and becomes the star of the World Mother Goose Theatre.
